name: ListServiceAccountAppKeys
description:
Retrieve all app keys for a specific service account.

Use this tool to list all application keys available for a specified service account in Datadog. It is useful when you need to manage or audit the application keys associated with a service account.

parameters.name: service_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the service account whose application keys are to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: The ID of the service account.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of application keys to retrieve per page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to be returned.

parameters.name: sort_order_attribute
parameters.description: Attribute to sort application keys. Prefix with '-' for descending order. Options: created_at, last4, name.

value_schema.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: filter_string_for_application_keys
parameters.description: Specify a string to filter the application keys by. Only keys containing the string will be shown.

value_schema.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: created_at_start_filter
parameters.description: Include application keys created on or after this date. Use format YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: created_before_date
parameters.description: Include application keys created on or before this date.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

value_schema.description:
Application key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

value_schema.description: Filter application keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][start]
parameters.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][end]
parameters.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include application keys created on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: service_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the service account.

value_schema.description: The ID of the service account.
